team.operation_notes: Doing remote paired coding sessions and enhanced bug rotation. Sales team has one dedicated sales person, founders also involved.

product_updates.description: AI agent development for automating customer workflows and new CRM integration platform launches. Stripe subscription migration supported and numerous UX/UI upgrades.
product_updates.impact: Platform stability increased, reducing churn. Largest customer is happy.

events.description: Hosted networking dinners for potential customers with a sponsor.
Mentioned in CFO Tech Outlook, Forbes, Inc, CNET, and other outlets. Won Merit Awards and Turpentine.

notes: Current focus on partnerships, sales funnel experiments, new marketing initiatives, enhancing engineering hiring. Using AI tools to enhance all employees’ work effectiveness.

product_updates.description: Enhanced AI Agent with new finance insights Q&A capabilities; new integrations with Xero and NetSuite; added dunning process and customizable invoice reminders; launched white-labeled customer portal; now supporting credit card payments.
product_updates.impact: Improved flexibility, convenience, cash flow, and supports more customers.

events.description: First event hosted: AI Unleashed – Turbocharging Startup Growth, in partnership with Codi and CLA.
Anelya Grant featured in AI Business.

notes: In talks to close a deal with a midsize accounting firm with 5,000+ potential clients. Demoing for account firms and startups to ramp MRR. Kicking off SOC 2 compliance. Developing new engineer hiring process.
